TopicTitle: YCG Gaming Smashing Kerbals KSP COMEDY VIDEO is out!

Articles.Content:
Hello there, this is YCG gamer (You Choose Gaming gamer). I am advertising a channel, but not any ordinary channel.

My YouTube channel is a one where you can vote what I make for most of my future videos! All of your comments will be read too!

My Youtube channel is where all (or at the very least, most) of your comments are read and (if you asked something) are answered!

Now, I have posted a KSP comedy video called KSP Smashing Kerbals. Take a look at it if you want to:

Link:

After you take a look at the video, I hope you have enjoyed it and will like the future ones i'll make!

If the video interests you, subscribe to it and/or like it to show you are interested .

I'll make a new poll sometime soon for another series/type of videos later on.

Thanks

YCG gamer
